text: Kevin is a jazz and classical guitarist living in the San Francisco Bay Area. Whether playing in a big band, a small combo, or laying down some nice tunes as a solo guitarist, he always adds a touch of class. He plays a little bit of everything, but in his own words, "I play jazz and classical because I love them - I play everthing else because they pay me."

He is available as a performer or teacher. When performing, he mostly plays jazz, but as a teacher he teaches any style and also teaches piano, bass, ukulele, and banjo. He also works as a composer, arranger, and transcriptionist.
